name: Spicy Garlic Butter Shrimp
steps: Heat 2 tbsp of butter in a skillet over medium heat.
Add the minced garlic and red pepper flakes. Stir and cook for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add the shrimp and season with salt and black pepper. Cook for 2-3 minutes per side until opaque.
Stir in the remaining butter and lemon juice. Cook for another minute.
Remove from heat and sprinkle with chopped parsley. Serve immediately!
